name: iOS-Category
summary: iOS Category for UIKit and Foundation classes like UIColor, UIView, NSDate, NSData etc
description:
Categories for Objective-C, Utility methods and Macros 

		   This library includes these categories:
		   - NSData
		   - NSDate
		   - NSObject
		   - NSString
		   - NSMutableArray
		   - UIAlertView
		   - UIApplication
		   - UIColor
		   - UIImage
		   - UIView
		   - UIViewController
		   - UILabel
